UsageEntitlementAccount.name: UsageEntitlementAccount
UsageEntitlementAccount.description: Represents the entitlement account details related to the asset that holds the wallet with the granted units.

AccountId.description: The account that's associated with the usage entitlement.

BillDayOfMonth.description: The day of the month that the bill is generated on and that ends the billing period.

BillingPeriodEndDateTime.description: The date and time when the billing period of the usage entitlements ends.

BillingPeriodStartDateTime.description: The date and time when the billing period of the usage entitlements starts.

BillingPeriodTerm.description: The frequency at which the bill is generated.

BillingPeriodUnit.description: The unit to measure the billing frequency.

EffectiveEndDateTime.description: The date and time when the usage entitlement account ends.

EffectiveStartDateTime.description: The date and time when the usage entitlement account starts.

GrantBindingTargetId.description: The target that's associated with the usage entitlement account.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: Autogenerated identifier for the usage entitlement account record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the usage entitlement account.

PricebookEntryId.description: The price book entry that's associated with the sellable product.

ProductId.description: The sellable product for which the entitlements are granted.
